document.full_text: a completely out-of-sorts roger federer lost 6-4 6-4 to austria's juergen melzer in blustery conditions at the monte carlo masters quarter-finals on friday.
document.title: federer blown away by melzer in monte carlo
lines_and_colors: a completely out-of-sorts roger federer lost 6-4 6-4 to austria's juergen melzer in blustery conditions at the monte carlo masters quarter-finals on friday.
